articles.author: ANI
articles.title: Study links cannabis use disorder with more complications after spinal surgery - Hindustan Times
articles.description: A new study reveals that patients with cannabis use disorder are at increased risk for several types of complications after spinal surgery like developing respiratory or blood clot-related problems, risk of stroke, neurologic or bloodstream infection
articles.content: For patients undergoing spinal surgery, the diagnosis of cannabis use disorder is associated with higher complication rates, including substantially increased risks of stroke and respiratory complica… [+4115 chars]

articles.title: The final insult: Some dying of COVID while awaiting vaccine - WSLS 10
articles.description: Air Force veteran Diane Drewes spent months hoping to receive a COVID-19 immunization.

articles.title: Cover up. Properly fitted, multi-layer masks can reduce transmission of virus by 96 per cent - Economic Times

articles.title: Anterior uveitis in paediatric inflammatory multisystem syndrome temporally associated with SARS-CoV-2 - The Lancet
articles.description:
A 12-year-old boy was referred to our hospital with a 6-day history of a fever—maximum
40°C—of unknown origin and malaise. He had no previous medical problems, no prior
upper respiratory tract symptoms, or known exposure to a SARS-CoV-2-positive individual.
